title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. Notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete occurs. The Launch item should stay on the second row.
EB: The Launch item should remain on the second row after deleting an item from the Coolbar.
SR:
1. Open the Coolbar interface.
2. Press the Delete button to delete an item from the second row.
3. Verify that the Launch item remains on the second row and does not move to the first row.
